import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { CoreContext } from "./Core"; function TimeCard(props) { const coreContext = useContext(CoreContext) const updateFields = () => { let start = document.getElementById("start-day").value let end = document.getElementById("end").value coreContext.setPayPeriodStart(start) coreContext.setPayPeriodEnd(end) } return(
